name: Nyon
description:
All the music and sfx i used are copyright free.

Here are the credits for the tracks:

Level 1 Track - Bluemoon

All the other Tracks -  Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio

The track names appear in the start of each level.


Known Bugs :

Sometimes when you die and the game loads you spawn a little bit far from the checkpoint and it doesn't activate.

For whatever reason if you die without it activated the game freezes in a transition screen that never appears, if this happens to you , Just press 'Esc' and continue the game.
